markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Runelord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=7482) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Convocation</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=683" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Class" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=397" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Rival Academies](/Sources.aspx?ID=235) pg. 116

**Archetype** [Runelord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=303)

**Prerequisites**
[runelord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=303)

</column>

---

Your connection to your sin suffuses all magic you use. When you contemplate or indulge in your sin to Refocus, you can also exchange one spell you have prepared for one of your curriculum or sin spells of the same rank.

<title level="2">Runelord Dedication leads to...</title>
[Embed Aeon Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=7483), [Rod of Rule](/Feats.aspx?ID=7485), [Sin Counterspell](/Feats.aspx?ID=7488), [Sin Reservoir](/Feats.aspx?ID=7487), [Sinbladed Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=7486)
name: Runelord Dedication
